items.name: Simple Pistol
items.description: This simple revolver trades accuracy for flexibility.

items.name: Assault Rifle
items.description: The fastest way to fill a target with holes.

items.name: Rocket Launcher
items.description: Mankind's ultimate portable killing device.

items.name: Simple Bullet
items.description: Primarily used with forged handguns.

items.name: Bow
items.description: A ranged weapon that can fire Stone Arrows or Tranquilizer Arrows upgrade requires Slingshot engram.

items.name: Grenade
items.description: Pulling the pin starts a 5 second timer to an explosion. Make sure you've thrown it by then.

items.name: Wood
items.description: Cut from trees.

items.name: Stone
items.description: Mined from rocks.

items.name: Metal
items.description: Mined from certain rocks, usually found high on mountains, in caves, rivers, or deep water sources. Can be refined in a forge or used on machines like the lathe.

items.name: Hide
items.description: Thick skin, hacked from most dead animals.

items.name: Chitin
items.description: This firm, flexible material makes up exoskeletons. Hacked primarily from dead insects.

items.name: Raw Meat
items.description: Eating raw food will sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans. Most wild carnivores prefer raw meat to Cooked Meat.

items.name: Cooked Meat
items.description: Sates your hunger and provides health while being digested. Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

items.name: Water Jar
items.description: Safely carries a lot of water, but is also a bit heavy.

items.name: Cloth Pants
items.description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries. Required skill to learn Hide Pants

items.name: Cloth Shirt
items.description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries. Required skill to learn Hide Shirt and other advanced armor.

items.name: Cloth Hat
items.description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries. Required skill for Hide Hat and other advanced armor.

items.name: Cloth Boots
items.description: Hide-soles shoes provide some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

items.name: Cloth Gloves
items.description: Hide-padded gloves provide some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

items.name: Hide Pants
items.description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection. Requires Cloth Pants Engram as well.

items.name: Hide Shirt
items.description: Keeps you warm while providing some protection. Requires Cloth Shirt engram as well.

items.name: Hide Hat
items.description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

items.name: Hide Boots
items.description: Keeps you warm while provides some physical protection.

items.name: Hide Gloves
items.description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

items.name: Chitin Leggings
items.description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

items.name: Chitin Chestpiece
items.description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

items.name: Chitin Helmet
items.description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

items.name: Chitin Boots
items.description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

items.name: Chitin Gauntlets
items.description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

items.name: Stone Arrow
items.description: An arrow for the Bow.

items.name: Stone Pick
items.description: A large stone pick for harvesting primarily flint from rocks, thatch from trees, and raw meat from bodies.

items.name: Stone Hatchet
items.description: A sharp flint hatchet for harvesting wood from trees, stone from rocks, and skin from bodies.

items.name: Metal Pick
items.description: A sharp metal pick for harvesting metal from mountain rocks, flint from rocks, and meat from bodies.

items.name: Metal Hatchet
items.description: A sharp metal hatchet for harvesting wood from trees, stone from rocks, and skin from bodies.

items.name: Torch
items.description: Provides light, and some warmth. Doubles as a melee weapon in a pinch.

items.name: Paintbrush
items.description: Apply a dye to this, then swing it at structures to paint them.

items.name: Campfire
items.description: Perfect for cooking meat, staying warm, and providing light.

items.name: Standing Torch
items.description: A torch on a small piece of wood that lights and warms the immediate area.

items.name: Hide Sleeping Bag
items.description: This hide sleeping bag acts as a single-use respawn point, only usable by you.

items.name: C4 Remote Detonator
items.description: This device uses radio waves to detonate primed C4 packages on the same frequency.

items.name: C4 Charge
items.description: This advanced explosive can annihilate structures.

items.name: Blood Extraction Syringe
items.description: Use this on a human to extract their blood for transfusion.

items.name: Blood Pack
items.description: Use this to replace lost blood. Restores Health over time.

items.name: Improvised Explosive Device
items.description: Place two of these near each other to create an explosive trap.

items.name: Waterskin
items.description: Goods to keep you hydrated, but slowly leaks water.

items.name: Fertilizer
items.description: High nitrogen fertilizer that helps crops grow in their plots.

items.name: Bingleberry Soup
items.description: Eat it to gain mega nourishment, long-term fortification!

items.name: Medical Brew
items.description: This brew doesn't have any nutritional value, but it promotes healing.

items.name: Energy Brew
items.description: This brew doesn't have any nutritional value, but fills your stamina.

items.name: Human Feces
items.description: Everyone poops. Can provide nitrogen to help crops grow in plots. Would be more efficient fertilizer if combined with thatch in a bin.

items.name: Spear
items.description: An easily made melee weapon that can also be thrown. Has a chance to break when used.

items.name: Rex Saddle
items.description: Equip a T-rex with this to ride it.

items.name: GPS
items.description: Detects strange energy from the three Obelisks to triangulate your exact location on the island.

items.name: Flint
items.description: Ferroceric flint that holds an edge better than regular stone.

items.name: Metal Ingot
items.description: Created by refining metal ore in a forge.

items.name: Thatch
items.description: Sticks torn from trees. Useful for primitive buildings.

items.name: Fiber
items.description: Delicately collected strands of plant. Perfect for making thread, cloth or rope.

items.name: Charcoal
items.description: Created by burning wood.

items.name: Crystal
items.description: This strange crystalline material can be shaped into lenses, used as an electronics component, or mixed into powerful explosives.

items.name: Thatch Door
items.description: Enough sticks bundled together works as a simple door. Can be locked for security but not very strong.

items.name: Thatch Foundation
items.description: A foundation is required to build structures. This on is a wooden frame with some smooth bundles of sticks that act as a floor.

items.name: Thatch Wall
items.description: A simple wall made of bundled sticks, and stabilized by a wooden frame. Fairly fragile, but better than nothing.

items.name: Thatch Doorframe
items.description: This thatch wall has entrance in it, but requires more wood to stay stable.

items.name: Wooden Catwalk
items.description: A thin walkway for bridging areas together. Made from sturdy wood.

items.name: Wooden Ceiling
items.description: A stable wooden ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

items.name: Wooden Hatchframe
items.description: A wooden ceiling with a hole in it for trapdoors.

items.name: Wooden Door
items.description: A stable wooden door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

items.name: Wooden Foundation
items.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from sturdy wood.

items.name: Wooden Ladder
items.description: A simple wooden ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

items.name: Wooden Pillar
items.description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is built on. Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines. works well with wooden hatch frame for a base foundation.

items.name: Wooden Ramp
items.description: An inclined wooden floor for travelling up or down. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

items.name: Wooden Trapdoor
items.description: This small wooden door can be used to secure hatches.

items.name: Wooden Wall
items.description: A sturdy wooden wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity.

items.name: Wooden Doorframe
items.description: A wooden wall that provides entrance to a structure.

items.name: Wooden Windowframe
items.description: A wooden wall with a hole for a window.

items.name: Wooden Window
items.description: Wooden beams on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

items.name: Wooden Sign
items.description: A simple wooden sign for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

items.name: Citronal
items.description: This citrus fruit grows naturally along the coast. It will probably prevent scurvy.

items.name: Parasaur Saddle
items.description: Equip a Parasaur with this to ride it.

items.name: Raptor Saddle
items.description: Equip a Raptor with this to ride it.

items.name: Pulmonoscorpius Saddle
items.description: Equip a Pulmonoscorpius with this to ride it.

items.name: Storage Box
items.description: A small box to store goods in.

items.name: Large Storage Box
items.description: A large box to store goods in.

items.name: Mortar And Pestle
items.description: This simple stone contraption can be used to grind resources into new substances.

items.name: Sparkpowder
items.description: Created by grinding flint with stone in a Mortar and Pestle.

items.name: Gunpowder
items.description: An explosive propellant. Necessary for any firearm or explosive.

items.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Intake
items.description: The stone intake for an irrigation network that transports water over land.

items.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Straight
items.description: A straight stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water across land.

items.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Inclined
items.description: An inclined stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down hills.

items.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Intersection
items.description: A plus-shaped stone intersection for an irrigation network, used for splitting one water source into three.

items.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Vertical
items.description: A vertical stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down cliffs.

items.name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Tap
items.description: This stone tap allows access to the water in an irrigation network. Can refill containers, irrigate crop plots, or provide a refreshing drink.

items.name: Amarberry
items.description: This yellow berry grows mostly on the beaches. Tasty, and can be used to make yellow dye.

items.name: Azulberry
items.description: This blue berry grows mostly in dense jungles. Tasty, and can be used to make blue dye.

items.name: Tintoberry
items.description: This blue berry grows mostly in dense jungles. Tasty, and can be used to make blue dye.

items.name: Mejoberry
items.description: This wild berry grows mostly on mountains. While not tasty on it's own, its juices improve almost every meal.

items.name: Narcoberry
items.description: This fairly common black berry makes you sleepy when you eat it. Bitter, but can be used to make black dye.

items.name: Stimberry
items.description: This fairly common white berry can be eaten in a pinch to recover food, stamina, and lose torpidity, but it will dehydrate you. Bitter, but can be used to make white dye.

items.name: Narcotic
items.description: Increases your health, but puts you to sleep.

items.name: Stimulant
items.description: Keeps you awake, but dehydrates you.

items.name: Refining Forge
items.description: Requires wood, thatch, or sparkpowder to activate. Put unrefined resources in this to refine them.

items.name: Smithy
items.description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create certain advanced forged items.

items.name: Compost Bin
items.description: A large bin for converting thatch and dung into high-quality fertilizer.

items.name: Cooking Pot
items.description: Must contain basic fuel to light the fire. Put various ingredients with water in this to make soups, stews, and dyes.

items.name: Simple Bed
items.description: Thatch may not make the most comfortable mattress, but this bed acts as a respawn point for you and your tribe.

items.name: Small Crop Plot
items.description: A small garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

items.name: Pteranodon Saddle
items.description: Equip a Pteranodon with this to ride it.

items.name: Longneck Rifle
items.description: This simple single-shot rifle is higly accurate, but has a long reload time.

items.name: Bronto Saddle
items.description: Equip a Bronto with this to ride it.

items.name: Wooden Fence Foundation
items.description: This very cheap, narrow foundation is used to build fences around an area.

items.name: Compass
items.description: Use this to find which direction your are traveling.

items.name: Scope Attachment
items.description: The carefully shaped crystal lenses in this scope grant the user a telescopic aim when firing. Attach this to a supporting weapon to gain more accurate aiming.

items.name: Slingshot
items.description: A simple ranged weapon that deals damage from afar. Better for knocking out a target than killing it outright. Requires stone to fire.

items.name: Pike
items.description: A powerful weapon tipped with metal. Unlike the Spear, it cannot be thrown.

items.name: Radio
items.description: Use this to communicate securely over great distances.

items.name: Obsidian
items.description: A very rare resource, found underground. Can be broken down and used to make modern tech.

items.name: Dinosaur Gateway
items.description: A large wood and stone gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

items.name: Simple Rifle Ammo
items.description: An odd bullet and casing, used with forged rifles.

items.name: Cementing Paste
items.description: Paste created at Mortar and Pestle.

items.name: Dinosaur Gate
items.description: A large wooden gate that can be used with a gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out. Cannot be destroyed by any dinosaur.

items.name: Oil
items.description: A thicc blob of unrefined oil. Can be refined with hide to make gasoline.

items.name: Silica Pearls
items.description: These pearls are made almost entirely of silicon. Can be refined into silicon plates.

items.name: Gasoline
items.description: An advanced fuel. Can only be used in machines designed to consume it.

items.name: Electronics
items.description: This multipurpose computer chip can be used to create electronic devices.

items.name: Polymer
items.description: These incredibly strong, lightweight plates can be shaped and then heat treated into casings for anything.

items.name: Metal Catwalk
items.description: A thin walkway for bridging areas together. Made from metal plates.

items.name: Metal Ceiling
items.description: A stable metal-plated concrete ceiling that provides insulation, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

items.name: Metal Hatchframe
items.description: This metal-plated concrete ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

items.name: Metal Door
items.description: A stable metal-plated concrete door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

items.name: Metal Fence Foundation
items.description: This very strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

items.name: Metal Foundation
items.description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area. This one is made from sturdy metal-plated concrete.

items.name: Behemoth Gate
items.description: A large metal-plated concrete gate that can be used with a Behemoth Gateway to allow even the largest of creatures in or out.

items.name: Behemoth Gateway
items.description: A large metal-plated concrete gateway, reinforced with obsidian polymer, that can be used with a Behemoth Gate to allow even the largest of creatures in or out.

items.name: Metal Ladder
items.description: A simple metal ladder used to climb up or down tall structures. Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

items.name: Metal Pillar
items.description: This metal-plated concrete pillar adds structural integrity to the area it is built under. Can also act as stilts for building on inclines.

items.name: Metal Ramp
items.description: An inclined metal-plated concrete floor for travelling up or down levels. Can also be used to make an angled roof.

items.name: Metal Trapdoor
items.description: This metal-plated concrete slab can be used to secure hatches.

items.name: Metal Wall
items.description: A metal-plated concrete wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

items.name: Metal Doorframe
items.description: A metal-plated concrete wall that provides entrance to a structure.

items.name: Metal Windowframe
items.description: A metal-plated concrete wall, with a hole for a window.

items.name: Metal Window
items.description: Metal plates on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

items.name: Flare Gun
items.description: A single-use flare lancher. Fires a bright ball of Sparkpowder to temporarily light an area.

items.name: Fabricator
items.description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create certain high-end machined items.

items.name: Water Reservoir
items.description: A standing storage device for holding water. Automatically fills up during rain, can be filled up with the use of a water skin/jar.

items.name: Parachute
items.description: Use this while falling to slow your fall. Jump while parachuting to deactivate it.

items.name: Air Conditioner
items.description: Requires electricity to run. Provides insulation from both the heat and the cold to an area.

items.name: Electrical Generator
items.description: A large machine that converts gasoline into electricity.

items.name: Electrical Outlet
items.description: An outlet for an electrical grid. When connected to a generator via cables, this provides power to all nearby devices that use electricity.

items.name: Inclined Electrical Cable
items.description: An inclined cable for transmitting electricity up and down hills.

items.name: Electrical Cable Intersection
items.description: A plus-shaped intersection for a power grid, used for splitting one power cable into three.

items.name: Straight Electrical Cable
items.description: A straight cable, used for transmitting electricity across land.

items.name: Vertical Electrical Cable
items.description: An vertical cable for transmitting electricity up and down cliffs.

items.name: Lamppost
items.description: Requires electricity to activate. Lights an area without adding much heat.

items.name: Refrigerator
items.description: Requires electricity to run. Keeps perishables from spoiling for a long time.

items.name: Auto Turret
items.description: Requires electricity to run. Consumes bullets while firing. Can be configured to automatically attack hostiles within range.

items.name: Remote Keypad
items.description: Allows remote access to multiple doors and/or lights.

items.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Inclined
items.description: An inclined metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down hills.

items.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Intersection
items.description: A plus-shaped metal intersection for an irrigation network, used for splitting one water source into three.

items.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Straight
items.description: A straight metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water across land.

items.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Tap
items.description: This Metal intake allows water in an irrigation network.

items.name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Vertical
items.description: A vertical metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down cliffs.

items.name: Flashlight Attachment
items.description: Press N to activate.

items.name: Silencer Attachment
items.description: The lubricated materials in this silencer slow the gases released from a gunshot, muffling the sound. Attach this to a supporting weapon for reduced noise when firing.

items.name: Carbonemys Saddle
items.description: Equip a Carbonemys with this to ride it.

items.name: Sarco Saddle
items.description: Equip a Sarco with this to ride it.

items.name: Ankylo Saddle
items.description: Equip a Ankylo with this to ride it.

items.name: Mammoth Saddle
items.description: Equip a Mammoth with this to ride it.

items.name: Megalodon Saddle
items.description: Equip a Megalodon with this to ride it.

items.name: Sabertooth Saddle
items.description: Equip a Sabertooth with this to ride it.

items.name: Carno Saddle
items.description: Equip a Carno with this to ride it.

items.name: Argentavis Saddle
items.description: Equip an Argentavis with this to ride it.

items.name: Chitin/Keratin
items.description: A firm, flexible material. Can be found in some animal horns, plates, shells, and ridges.

items.name: Keratin
items.description: A firm, flexible material. Can be found in some animal horns, plates, shells, and ridges.

items.name: Holo-Scope Attachment
items.description: This advanced scope can tell friends from strangers. Attach this to a supporting weapon to gain more accurate aiming.

items.name: Laser Attachment
items.description: This advanced aiming device places a red dot where the weapon is pointed. Attach this to a supporting weapon to add a laser sight.

items.name: Flak Leggings
items.description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

items.name: Flak Chestpiece
items.description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

items.name: Flak Helmet
items.description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

items.name: Flak Boots
items.description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

items.name: Flak Gauntlets
items.description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

items.name: Enduro Stew
items.description: This hearty dish is like a workout in the form of a meal. You will find yourself hitting harder and running longer after eating this.

items.name: Lazarus Chowder
items.description: This creamy dish improves the body's natural constitution. You will recover from injury more quickly after eating this, and your body will need less oxygen.

items.name: Calien Soup
items.description: This simple vegetarian dish refreshes your body like an oasis. Consume it to gain increased hyperthermic insulation, and slow your rate of water consumption.

items.name: Fria Curry
items.description: This spicy vegetarian dish fills the body with a comfortable warmth. It controls your appetite while helping you ignore cold.

items.name: Focal Chili
items.description: This filling dish is full of nutritional energy. Consume it to gain increased crafting speed, and gain increased movement speed. Effect lasts 15 minutes.

items.name: Savoroot
items.description: This starchy tuber grows naturally in densely wooded areas. It is very hearty, but tastes better when cooked.

items.name: Longrass
items.description: This grain plant grows best in open, fertile areas. It can be eaten by the cob but more clever chefs will think of other options.

items.name: Rockarrot
items.description: This root vegetable seems to thrive near mammals, and not dinosaurs. As such, it can be found mostly in the mountains.

items.name: Rockarrot Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own rockarrot crop. Can be planted in Medium or Large crop plots.

items.name: Savoroot Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own savoroot crop. Can be planted in Medium or Large crop plots.

items.name: Longrass Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own longrass crop. Can be planted in Medium or Large crop plots.

items.name: Metal Billboard
items.description: A large metal billboard for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

items.name: Fabricated Pistol
items.description: This advanced pistol gains a high rate of fire and a large magazine size by sacrificing stopping power.

items.name: Advanced Bullet
items.description: Primarily used with fabricated handguns.

items.name: Advanced Rifle Bullet
items.description: Primarily used with fabricated rifles.

items.name: Rocket Propelled Grenade
items.description: Primarily used with rocket launchers.

items.name: Medium Crop Plot
items.description: A medium garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

items.name: Large Crop Plot
items.description: A large garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

items.name: Rare Flower
items.description: Even the smell of this flower makes you slightly angry.

items.name: Rare Mushroom
items.description: You feel lightheaded after just touching this. Ingesting it would be dangerous.

items.name: Raw Prime Meat
items.description: Eating raw food will sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans. This excellent cut spoils very quickly. Most wild carnivores love this meat.

items.name: Cooked Prime Meat
items.description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested. More effective than normal meat. Wild Carnivores like this meat a lot.

items.name: Battle Tartare
items.description: Only eat this dish when you intend to go into a brawl. It causes pain and stress to your body, but grants you almost supernatural strength, speed, and resilience. Warning: This concoction can be habit forming.

items.name: Shadow Steak Saute
items.description: This dish grants you clarity of the night. Consume it to see more light, ignore most weather, and strady your aim. Can be dangerous to use in daylight.

items.name: Metal Dinosaur Gateway
items.description: A large metal gateway that can be used with a gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

items.name: Metal Dinosaur Gate
items.description: A large metal gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

items.name: Simple Shotgun Ammo
items.description: A few simple bullets in a hide casing, used with forged shotguns.

items.name: Metal Wall Sign
items.description: A simple metal wall sign for basic messages, requires attaching to a wall.

items.name: Amarberry Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own amarberry bush. Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large crop plots.

items.name: Azulberry Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own azulberry bush. Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large crop plots.

items.name: Tintoberry Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Tintoberry bush. Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop plots.

items.name: Narcoberry Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Nacroberry bush. Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots.

items.name: Stimberry Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Stimberry bush. Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop plots.

items.name: Mejoberry Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Mejoberry bush. Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop plots.

items.name: Citronal Seed
items.description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own citronal crop. Can be planted in Medium or Large crop plots.

items.name: Spyglass
items.description: This instrument, while primitive, is quite effective at long-range reconaissance.

items.name: Parasaur Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipes, or...

items.name: Raptor Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipes, or...

items.name: Dodo Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipes, or...

items.name: Preserving Bin
items.description: Burns simple fuel at low temperatures to dehydrate food and kill bacteria. Keeps perishables from spoiling for a small time.

items.name: Metal Spike Wall
items.description: These incredibly sharp metal spikes are dangerous to any that touch them. Large creatures take more damage.

items.name: Cooked Meat Jerky
items.description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  Lasts longer than cooked meat.
Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

items.name: Prime Meat Jerky
items.description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  More effective than normal meat jerky, and lasts longer than cooked prime meat.
Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

items.name: Spino Saddle
items.description: Equip a Spino with this to ride it.

items.name: Vault
items.description: A large metal vault to securely store goods in.

items.name: Wooden Spike Wall
items.description: These incredibly sharp wooden stakes are dangerous to any that touch them. Larger creatures take more damage.

items.name: Bookshelf
items.description: A large bookshelf to store Blueprints, Notes, and other small trinkets in.

items.name: Stone Fence Foundation
items.description: This strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

items.name: Stone Wall
items.description: A brick-and-mortar wall that insulates the inside from the outside and seperates rooms.

items.name: Metal Water Reservoir
items.description: Attach this to pipes to store rain, irrigation, or manually deposited water for later use. Will automatically irrigate nearby crops if attached to a tap. Stores a large amount of water!

items.name: Plesiosaur Saddle
items.description: Equip a Plesiosaur with this to ride it.

items.name: Ichthyosaurus Saddle
items.description: Equip a Ichthyosaurus with this to ride it.

items.name: Stone Ceiling
items.description: A stable brick-and-mortar ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

items.name: Stone Hatchframe
items.description: This brick-and-mortar ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoor.

items.name: Reinforced Wooden Door
items.description: A reinforced wooden door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

items.name: Stone Foundation

items.description: Powers Tek Structures and electrical structures wirelessly! Requires Element to run, and Tek Engram to use.
items.fuelNote: 0.33 element per radius unit. (2.0x = 1.13 element every 18 hours)

items.name: Tek Teleporter
items.description: Allows instantaneous traversal between Teleporters! Requires Tek Generator to power, and Element & Tek Engram to use.

items.name: Vacuum Compartment
items.description: Place underwater, power with Tek Generator, and you can live and breath in it!

items.name: Vacuum Compartment Moonpool
items.description: Place underwater, power with Tek Generator, and you can live and breath in it! Has opening at the bottom for direct swimming access.

items.name: Cloning Chamber
items.description: Enables you to generate clones of your creatures!

items.name: Tek Turret
items.description: Consume two element shards per shot.

items.name: Motorboat
items.description: A floating metal platform that you can pilot across the water, requires gasoline to power its motor.  Can support the weight of structures and be built on.

items.name: Toilet
items.description: Attach to water pipes, and sit on it when you hear the call of nature. Do your business, feel refreshed, and then flush for efficient waste disposal!

items.name: Tek Trough
items.description: Put food for your nearby pets in this, and they'll automatically eat it when hungry! Can refridgerate items, so long as it's powered by a Tek Generator!

items.name: Tek Light
items.description: Useful for spelunking, they can be attached to any surface, self powered by Element Shards , or linked to generators, and picked-up after placement.

items.name: Heavy Auto Turret
items.description: Requires electricity to run. Provides increased firepower, but consumes FOUR bullets while firing.  Can be configured to automatically attack hostiles within range.

items.name: Fish Basket
items.description: Trap certain fish in this basket to tame and transport them!

items.name: Tek Sleeping Pod
items.description: This Tek-powered Chamber lets you rapidly recover vitals, and slowly gain XP even when sleeping. You can also sleep soundly within it, protected even while on a moving platform!

items.name: Gas Collector
items.description: Place on a Gas Vent to extract Congealed Gas Balls over time.

items.name: Large Wood Elevator Platform
items.description: Attach to an Elevator Track to lift a large amount of weight.

items.name: Medium Wood Elevator Platform
items.description: Attach to an Elevator Track to lift a medium amount of weight.

items.name: Metal Cliff Platform
items.description: A Cliff Platform is required to build structures extending from a cliff. This one is made from shiny metal.

items.name: Portable Rope Ladder
items.description: A portable ladder that can be used to climb up or down. Place onto structures or terrain at waist height or lower.

items.name: Shag Rug
items.description: A decorative, paintable rug with a shaggy appearance, which dulls the sound of footsteps.

items.name: Small Wood Elevator Platform
items.description: Attach to an Elevator Track to lift a small amount of weight.

items.name: Stone Cliff Platform
items.description: A Cliff Platform is required to build structures extending from a cliff. This one is made from heavy stone.

items.name: Wood Elevator Top Switch
items.description: Attach to the top of a Wood Elevator Track to complete an Elevator!

items.name: Wood Elevator Track
items.description: Attach a Wood Elevator Platform to these to complete an Elevator!

items.name: Aggeravic Mushroom
items.description: This mushroom can be found pretty much everywhere. It's tasty, and heals you slowly over time. Great in recipes!

items.name: Aquatic Mushroom
items.description: A wavy blueish-green mushroom with a glowing edge. Looks refreshing.

items.name: Ascerbic Mushroom
items.description: A mushroom as black as a moonless midnight. Looks to be highly narcotic.

items.name: Auric Mushroom
items.description: An oily-looking mushroom which glitters gold even in the dimmest light. Looks invigorating!

items.name: Mushroom Brew
items.description: Double, double, toil and trouble, fire burn and cauldron bubble... this is a lovely mushroom brew, a healthy syrup to protect your pets from radiation!

items.name: Beer Liquid
items.description: Put it in a glass jar to drink it!

items.name: Beer Jar
items.description: Mmmmm.
effects: Applies hangover for 1 minute after consumption, keeping stamina at 0 and preventing effects of stew

items.name: Bio Toxin
items.description: Powerful toxin harvested from an organism.

items.name: Bug Repellant
items.description: This gnarly paste makes you nearly invisible to bugs, bats, and spiders. Just don't attack them or get too close, and they'll ignore you! Effect lasts 10 minutes.

items.name: Cactus Broth
items.description: This magical soup will greatly reduce your water consumption. The aroma of the cactus has a side effect of making the wildlife notice you less.

items.name: Lesser Antidote
items.description: Cures Lesser Afflictions!

items.name: Sweet Vegetable Cake
items.description: A sappy vegetable cake which Herbivores find delicious, which will be automatically eaten when needed for healing. Alas, humans and carnivores tend to find its taste repugnant.

items.name: Chain Bola
items.description: A gigantic bola made of metal chain, capable of ensnaring larger creatures. Usable within a Ballista Turret.

items.name: Charge Lantern
items.description: Weaponized Charge Light that damages and stuns lifeforms. Place down to ward of dangers in an area. Uses Charge Batteries as fuel.

items.name: Climbing Pick
items.description: Climb up and hang from nearly any surface with these!

items.name: Cluster Grenade
items.description: Splits in several explosive fragments.

items.name: Flamethrower
items.description: The fastest way to roast a target.

items.name: Glow stick
items.description: Glow Sticks generate light in a radius around them. Throw it and it will stick immediately to the location they first impact.

items.name: Harpoon Launcher
items.description: Has tremendous power and speed underwater, but ineffective range out of water. Uses Spear Bolts for ammunition.

items.name: Lance
items.description: Knock your foes oft their mounts! Can only be utilized when riding a mount.

items.name: Lasso
items.description: An easily-crafted ranged tool that can ensnare and pull a target. Can only be wielded when riding a certain creature.

items.name: Oil Jar
items.description: Throw it to create an oil slick which can be lit on fire! This sticky substance can also slow down people which step in it!

items.name: Smoke Grenade
items.description: Releases a lot of smoke to obscure your plans. Pulling the pin starts a 5 second timer to an explosion.

items.name: Sword
items.description: The undisputed ruler of short-range combat. Needs a hotter flame to be forged.

items.name: Tek Grenade
items.description: Sticks to targets with a powerful Tek Explosion after 5 seconds. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

items.name: Tek Railgun
items.description:
Utilizing Element, enables you to see and shoot through walls and solid surfaces. Also has an optional Thermal Scope.
Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

items.name: Tek Rifle
items.description:
Shoots explosive plasma bolts, with an infrared zoomable scope.
Equipping requires learning this Tekgram.

items.name: Tek Sword
items.description: Cuts through metal and armor when infused with Element, and supports a Charge Attack. Equipping requires learning this Tekgram

items.name: Cannon Ball
items.description: A gigantic ball of heavy metal, capable of demolishing very strong structures.

items.name: Flame Arrow
items.description: Lights the target on fire, and can also light oil slicks.

items.name: Flamethrower Ammo
items.description: Fuel for the flamethrower.

items.name: Grappling Hook
items.description: Apply on the Crossbow to grapple onto the environment & other creatures. Primary Fire to "Reel-In", Secondary Fire to "Reel-Out", Crouch to Detach, Jump + Reel-In to Vault-Jump!

items.name: Tranquilizer Dart
items.description: A potent dart full of tranquilizing poison. For use in a Longneck rifle. Can not be used with attachments.

items.name: Pheromone Dart
items.description: A dart full of refined Ammonite chemicals, inject on a target to enrage nearby wild creatures. For use in a Longneck rifle. Can not be used with attachments.

items.name: Rocket Homing Missile
items.description: Advanced projectile with trajectory auto-correction.

items.name: Shocking Tranquilizer Dart
items.description: A doubly potent dart full of refined Cnidaria toxin, which also  shocks humans. For use in a Longneck rifle. Can not be used with attachments.

items.name: Tranq Spear Bolt
items.description: A massive bolt with a tranq dart mounted on the front. Used as an underwater tranquilizer projectile with the Harpoon Gun. If it doesn't break, you can recover the spear bolt.

items.name: Zip-Line Anchor
items.description: Apply onto a Crossbow to fire Zip-Line anchor points. Use two anchor points to complete a Zip-Line, which you can then grab onto.

items.name: Managarmr Saddle
items.description: Equip a Managarmr with this to ride it.

items.description: Equip an Snow Owl with this to ride it.

items.description: Equip a Velonasaur with this to ride it.

items.name: Gacha Saddle
items.description: Equip a Gacha with this to ride it.

items.description: Place a harvested dermis to show off your prowess!

items.description: Place a harvested dermis to show off your prowess!

items.description: Place a harvested dermis to show off your prowess!

items.description: Pulling the pin starts a 5 second timer to an explosion.  Make sure you've thrown it by then.

items.description: Equip a Woolly Rhino with this to ride it.

items.description: Requires electricity to run.  Keeps Cryopods alive forever!

items.description: Required to build structures in an area. Triangle shaped.

items.description: Saddle

items.name: Regular Kibble
items.description: This specially blended pet food is a favorite of many medium creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

items.name: Superior Kibble
items.description: This specially blended pet food is a favorite of many larger creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

items.name: Exceptional Kibble
items.description: This specially blended pet food is a favorite of many extra large creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

items.name: Extraordinary Kibble
items.description: This specially blended pet food is a favorite of many exotic creatures. Containing only the finest natural ingredients, it provides pets with the balanced nutrition they need. And with a taste they can't resist, they'll warm up to you in no time! Not intended for human consumption.

items.name: Simple Kibble
items.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many small creatures.  Includes plant fibers to help with digestion and egg to bind the mix.  Humans have difficulty digesting this.

items.name: Basic Kibble
items.description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to many smaller creatures.  Includes plant fibers to help with digestion and egg to bind the mix.  Humans have difficulty digesting this.

items.name: Achatina Paste
items.description: Achatina secretion chemically similar to cementing paste.

items.description: A congealed glob of Ammonite Bile. Can be used for medicinal purposes when carefully prepared.

items.description: Rare mechanochemical substance derived from Mutagen. Use with caution to tame autonomous Stryders.

items.description: When infused with Element Shards, will 3-D print high velocity explosive arrows at a cost of Element Shards. Can also fire other arrow types.

items.description: High-speed projectile that unfurls to ensnare creatures in netting. Can only be fired from a Harpoon Launcher.

items.name: Raw Prime Fish Meat
items.description: Eating raw food will SLIGHTLY sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  This excellent cut spoils very quickly. Most wild carnivores love this meat.

items.name: Raw Fish Meat
items.description: Eating raw food will SLIGHTLY sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  Most wild carnivores prefer raw meat to cooked meat.

items.description: Equip a Deinonychus with this to ride it.

items.description: Equip a Tropeognathus with this to ride it. Saddle is mounted with a cannon that fires grenades and a gasoline-powered jet engine.

items.description: An incredibly effective gasoline-powered harvesting tool that utilizes an energy beam to collect valuable resources at distance.

items.name: Amargasaurus Saddle

items.description:
Equip a Andrewsarchus with this to ride it. 

The saddle is mounted with a minigun that fires advanced rifle ammo.

items.description: Equip a Desmodus with this to ride it.

items.description: Tastes salty and metallic, yet still strangely alluring to hungry creatures...

items.description: An air bladder from a Gasbags

items.description:
Eating raw food will sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  This excellent cut spoils very quickly.
Most wild carnivores love this meat.

items.description: Equip a Mek with this to enhance it. Unequipping reduces durability.

items.name: M.R.L.M.
items.description: Mek Rocket Launcher Module. Equip a Mek with this module to arm it with a wide reaching swarm-fire rocket launcher. Unequipping reduces durability. Requires Rocket Pods to fire.

items.name: M.D.S.M.
items.description: Mek Deployable Shield Module. Equip a Mek with this module to arm it with a large deployable dome shield. Unequipping reduces durability.

items.description:
MegaMek Operational Materialization Interface. Drag this to a Mek Module slot to enable forming the MegaMek!
Requires three additional nearby Meks to transform. Will fail to operate unless if not in range of the Alpha King Titan.

items.name: Corrupted Nodule
items.description: These incredibly strong, lightweight nodules are somehow naturally made in corrupted creatures. Incredibly hazardous to human health if consumed.

items.name: King Titan Flag
items.description: This flag is proof that you have defeated the King of the Titans.

items.name: King Titan Flag
items.description: This flag is proof that you have defeated the Mecha King of the Titans!
